name: @hmcts/nfdiv-case-definition
description: Utility to help creating CCD config definitions

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run genCaseTypeConsts && npm run genEventNameConsts
scripts.genCaseTypeConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/ccd/NoFaultDivorce.java | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.genEventNameConsts: grep -rh "public static final String" ./src/main/java/uk/gov/hmcts/divorce/citizen/event | sed "s/    public static final String/export const/" >> ./build/ts/index.ts
scripts.test-e2e-standalone: SHOW_BROWSER_WINDOW=yes NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true codeceptjs run xui/test/solicitorCreateCase.test.js  -c ./xui --steps
